00031 // Graphics
00032 // TODO pasar a común
00033 #include "graphics/GraphicsTypes.h"
00034 using namespace Graphics;
00035 
00036 namespace ComputerVision
00037 {
00038 
00043 struct Blob
00044 {
00045         typedef std::vector<Pos2D> BlobContourPoints; 
00046 
00047     // Constructor
00048     Blob( float _area, CvSeq* _contour ) : area( _area ), contour( _contour ) {}
00049 
00051     bool operator < ( const Blob& other ) const { return area < other.area; }
00052     bool operator > ( const Blob& other ) const { return area > other.area; }
00053 
00054     float                   area;                 
00055     CvRect                      bbox;             
00056     Pos2D                               center;         
00057           BlobContourPoints nodes;              
00058 
00059 private:
00060     // This is done to avoid making contour attribute public
00061     friend class BlobFinder; 
00062 
00063     CvSeq*      contour;
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 } // namespace ComputerVision
